summary: Website project “vs-appliances-spares-and-service” with versioned drafts; Draft Version 13 has been deployed and user wants changes (replace icons with images) and help getting the site listed on Google Search.
architectural_notes: Project uses versioned drafts (e.g., Version 6) with deploy/publish workflow to production; live site hosted at https://vs-appliances-spares-and-service.icp0.io
Draft Version 13 was deployed during the conversation; production publish status is not explicitly confirmed.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Phone handset icon, solid/flat style, transparent background (phone-icon.dim_64x64.png)
- Envelope/mail icon, solid/flat style, transparent background (email-icon.dim_64x64.png)
- Map pin/location icon, solid/flat style, transparent background (location-icon.dim_64x64.png)
- Circular loading spinner icon (separate frames not required), transparent background (loading-spinner.dim_64x64.png)
- Checkmark in a circle icon, transparent background (success-check.dim_256x256.png)

existing_features.title: Replace the current lucide-react icons with static image assets across the site, specifically: - In `frontend/src/App.tsx`, replace `Phone`, `Mail`, and `MapPin` icon components in the header/mobile header and Contact section with `` tags pointing to new files under `/assets/generated/`. - In `frontend/src/components/BookServiceDialog.tsx`, replace `Loader2` (submitting spinner) and `CheckCircle2` (success state) with `` tags pointing to new files under `/assets/generated/`. The new images must visually match the current icon sizes and alignment (including existing Tailwind sizing classes) and include appropriate `alt` text for accessibility.

Add the required icon image files as static assets under `frontend/public/assets/generated/` using the exact filenames listed in `imageRequirements.required`, so the frontend can reference them via `/assets/generated/...`.

new_feature_requests.summary: Publish/deploy draft Version 6 to production for the project "vs-appliances-spares-and-service" and confirm that the production site at https://vs-appliances-spares-and-service.icp0.io is serving Version 6.
Replace existing icons on the website with images (user request: “change Icons to Image's”).

Assist with Google Search indexing by adding the Google Search Console site verification meta tag to the site once the full meta tag is provided, and ensure sitemap submission guidance for https://vs-appliances-spares-and-service.icp0.io.
Publish/deploy the currently deployed Draft Version 13 to production (if not already published) and confirm the live site is serving Version 13.
